A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I honestly can't believe that I'm saying this but The Last Jedi is even worse than the Force Awakens.
Swinging from the ridiculous to the obnoxious\, the movie is a symposium of failure. Every character is thoroughly unlikeable\, every scene a rabbit hole they just fall through\, effecting nothing\, as clods of fan service and god awful gags tumble them this way and that.
Gaping plot holes\, hokey logic\, heroes who are idiots and ill conceived set pieces made this an eye rolling watch.
"Kill the past\, let it die" Kylo Ren exclaims and I agree\, if only I could kill the memory of the last 2hrs.
